mapper.insert: insert into advertisement(ad_num, membernickname, memberEmail,businessNum, ad_title, ad_content, ad_reco, ad_re_ref, ad_re_lev, ad_re_seq, ad_views, ad_date) values(seq_ad_num.nextval, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail},#{businessNum} ,#{ad_title}, #{ad_content}, 0, #{ad_re_ref}, #{ad_re_lev}, #{ad_re_seq}, #{ad_views}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select ad_num, ad_title, membernickname, ad_content, ad_re_ref, ad_re_lev, ad_re_seq, ad_views, ad_date from (select row_number() over (order by ad_re_ref desc, ad_re_seq asc) num, B.* from advertisement B where ad_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by ad_re_ref desc, ad_re_seq asc) where num between #{row1} and #{row1}+9
select count(*) from advertisement where ad_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update advertisement set ad_title=#{ad_title}, ad_content=#{ad_content} where ad_num=#{ad_num}
update advertisement set ad_re_ref=ad_re_ref+1 where ad_re_ref=#{ad_re_ref} and ad_re_seq>#{ad_re_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comlike where ad_num = #{ad_num} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
select count(*) from comlike where ad_num = #{ad_num} and likeN =#{likeN}
mapper.insert: insert into comlike (likenum ,ad_num , memberEmail,likeN) values((select * from (select NVL (max(likenum),0)+1 from comlike)), #{ad_num},#{memberEmail},1)
mapper.delete: delete from comlike where ad_num = #{ad_num} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
